author: Ootori_Shikikan
content: I'm surprised how good these things are. To eat. Starting from the head, working my way down, ahahaha…

comments.content: Assessment: Manjuu are inedible. Photograph depicts a stylized confectionery, likely a bun.
Hang on, you can EAT those?!
I've come up with a new recipe: Commander buns. If anyone wants to make some later, do let me know.

replies.content: Commander buns? I'm all in… Give me the ingredients and I'll have 500 ready by tomorrow~
No, we're not baking! Stop messing around!

comments.content: Looks delicious!

replies.content: Would you like one, my dear Commander? Open your mouth and I'll feed you~

comments.content: Don't eat the poor things!

replies.content: Would you like one, my dear Commander? Open your mouth and I'll feed you~

author: GascogneT8
content: Orders received from Master: "do whatever you want." Attention: unable to deduce meaning of said phrase.

comments.content: We have the day off, just play around and have some fun. :D

replies.content: Requesting examples of activities classified as "playing around and having fun."
Examples? Umm, surfing or sunbathing, I guess? Maybe building a sandcastle? I think you'd like that
"Build a sandcastle." Interest piqued…

comments.content: Are you SERIOUSLY chilling on the beach? We've got stuff to do.

replies.content: Cmon, don't be the no-fun police! It's our day off, let loose a little! > <
Let loose?! Are you implying I'm all wound up?!

comments.content: Building a sandcastle sounds like a good idea!

replies.content: Orders received, directive updated. Commencing sandcastle construction.

author: GascogneT8
content: Sandcastle construction complete.

comments.content: Wtf…

replies.content: Emotion experienced during construction process identified as "enjoyment."
Haha! Sounds like you had fun!

comments.content: Okay, I'll admit, it looks cool. But it's not AMAZING or anything.

replies.content: I saw you tried to make a sandcastle, too, but couldn't event manage to build a small tower. You have my sympathies.
Who asked for YOUR sympathy? I sure didn't!
Assistance with sandcastle construction is available, Hipper.
Keep it! I don't need your help!

comments.content: Awesome sandcastle!

replies.content: Conditions for experiencing the emotion known as "fun" have been met.

author: Cleveland☆Knight
content: #lunch #burgers Bought lunch for everyone! This stuff was HEAVY!

comments.content: You carried that food like a boss, sis!
I would've gone with you if you had told me…!
Way to go, Cleve! We'll buy for you next time!
Aww, what a sweet big sister.
Heavy? As in, on the arteries?

replies.content: Lol, kinda. One burger every now and then has never killed anyone tho :D

author: ShiningS
content: #Night_battle Fly me to the moon, and let me play among the stars.

comments.content: Uh, what?

replies.content: Starting simulation to calculate amount of energy required to travel to and play among celestial bodies…
Uhh… what?

comments.content: Let me see what spring is like on Jupiter and Mars… Such romantic lyrics.
Want me to ask Akashi how much it'd cost to go to space?

replies.content: It is painfully evident that you have no sense of romance, Master.

author: R-Guitarist
content: #hobbyhour #guitar I'm feeling it! My guitar and I are in perfect sync today!

comments.content: Wow! Your guitar looks AWESOME! :D

replies.content: Uh, sure… But I'm not fishing for compliments here! I'm so NOT happy you think it looks cool!
What was it Eugen said about tradition? Blonde, flat as a board, has attitude problems?
EXCUSE ME?! Are you saying I'm an ARCHETYPE?! Oh, you're gonna get it…

comments.content: Proposal: repaint guitars with colors associated with the Vichya Dominion.
Your guitar is such a gorgeous shade of red…
Rock 'n roll, Hipper!

replies.content: Huh? What's this all of a sudden?

author: Ootori_Shikikan
content: It's late and I'm in the practice room, but I just can't get fired up without the Commander by my side…

comments.content: Please practice without the Master in attendance. We *all* need to rehearse.
If you say you're gonna do something, do it right! Don't make excuses!

replies.content: My, you seem very serious about this. Pardon me if I'm mistaken, but didn't a certain somebody say, "It's not like this is worth getting worked up over or anything"
Excuse me?! When did I ever say something like that?! You're TOTALLY wrong AND misremembering!
*Sigh*… If only the Commander was here for me…

comments.content: Assessment: "practice" seems entertaining.
I know you're doing your best in there, Akagi! Keep it up! ^.^
Sorry I can't be there in person.

replies.content: It's okay, Commander! The moment I'm finished, I'll go straight to your office so we can be together!

comments.content: Give it your all out there.

author: Cleveland☆Knight
content: #growingbonsai I heard if you play music to plants they'll grow faster. Maybe it likes rock?

comments.content: Huh? Maybe a beanstalk from some fairytale would.

replies.content: Scientific consensus on the practice of using sound to stimulate organic growth: unproven.
Well, maybe it'll work anyway…

comments.content: Perhaps the bond between us will grow faster if I sing to the Commander every day…

replies.content: Ahaha… I guess?

comments.content: With you caring for it, it will surely grow into a wonderful bonsai whether you play music for it or not.

replies.content: True! I take good care of my little plants.

comments.content: It could work, maybe.

replies.content: You really think so? :o

author: ShiningS
content: #practice I am practicing my part. It is not quite satisfactory yet.

comments.content: What? You're plenty good already, Sheffy!

replies.content: Music, much like cleaning, are skills that can always be improved. I am far from perfect.

comments.content: Sure. At least get good enough to not drag everyone else down!

replies.content: Certainly. But perhaps you should take your own advice, Hipper.
Excuse me? I AM practicing! Geez!

comments.content: I'd love to hear your singing, live.

replies.content: That can be arranged, Master. Would you mind if I sing a song that also places a curse on you? …I am joking, of course.

author: R-Guitarist
content: #coffeebreak #getsmegoing A nice cup of coffee after work really hits the spot.

comments.content: I'm more of a tea person myself.

replies.content: Okay? Coffee boosts your alertness way more than tea does.

comments.content: I'm baffled by how some people unironically drink enjoy drinking something that tastes like burnt dishwater.

replies.content: YOU baffle ME! EVERYONE drinks coffee! You just have no idea how to brew it!

comments.content: I guess you could say it's not her cup of tea… How about an ice-cold Oxy-cola to help cool down?
Do you like it black?

replies.content: Yeah, I guess?

author: GascogneT8
content: #Training Gascogne is self-evaluating ability to sing with emotion.

comments.content: What you need is love. Yes, love. LOVE makes everything possible!

replies.content: Topic: "love" identified. Attention: database lacking in records on this emotion.

comments.content: Just follow your heart and do what feels right! No regrets or second guessing!
Cleve's right. I'd take her words to heart if I were you.
You're a great singer, Gascogne.

replies.content: Assessment: interpreting praise of singing ability as equal to praise of emotional capacity may cause disruptions in analytic systems…

author: Ootori_Shikikan
content: My fortune slip says my luck will be excellent~! What fortuitous things could happen today? A liaison with the Commander, perhaps~?

comments.content: You should refrain from making blog posts like this, dear sister…

replies.content: And why should I refrain from expressing my love for the Commander, Kaga?
Please, let us stick to using our usernames…

comments.content: Business as usual for Akagi I guess xD

replies.content: You too. Usernames, got it?

comments.content: Maybe I'll buy a fortune slip sometime later too. Not that I'm curious in any way.
That's nice.

replies.content: Why don't you buy one as well, Commander? Then we can move to the next step: tying the knot~

author: R-Guitarist
content: #out-of-season-oktoberfest Nothing goes together like beer and bratwurst!

comments.content: Not nagging for 5 seconds and actually enjoying yourself? Who are you and what have you done to Hipper?

replies.content: Excuse me? Who said I'm enjoying myself? And don't you have something better to do?
There, that's more like it! I was starting to worry that you'd deviated from your archetype.

comments.content: Normally, I feel awkward at parties… but being with my Iron Blood friends makes it easier.
It's nice to have a celebration every once in a while… Plus it offers Spee many opportunities to socialize and have fun! Ahahahah!
Prost!

replies.content: Uh, yeah, prost. It's a shame you're not here to enjoy it, isn't it? Who know, maybe SOMEONE will let you join us!

comments.content: Those sausages look yummy.

replies.content: It sounds like you really wish you were here, am I right? Maybe we'll let you join us at some point!

comments.content: You have an interest in not just growing bonsai, but gardening in general?

Not really? That's just common knowledge.

comments.content: Cleveland, the green-fingered light cruiser!

replies.content: LOL I'm just a beginner! This is nothing special ^^'

comments.content: You were amazing, Cleve! I wish I'd brought a camera to record it!

comments.content: I get you. Nothing beats a good drumming session!

replies.content: Heck yeah! I knew you'd understand, Commander!

comments.content: IN CLEVE WE BELIEVE!

author: Ootori_Shikikan
content: Baked with love by yours truly ♥

comments.content: Oh my, I didn't know you had a girlish side, senpai~ Hopefully you didn't mistake the salt for the sugar again~

replies.content: Sis, please… Stop trying to troll her…

replies.content: Thank you. With my love for the Commander, I can make anything amazing.

author: ShiningS
content: #BehindTheScenes #Backstage I would like to thank everyone working behind the scenes. They help make our performances truly special.

comments.content: Yeah, props to them! Keep up the great work!
A lot of their work goes unnoticed, but they deserve a huge thanks.
As the head maid, I am honoured to be of your assistance. We hope to provide our services to you again in the future.

replies.content: Certainly, Belfast… I will try my best as well.

comments.content: Rock the stage, Sheffield!

replies.content: I am already rocking the stage, Master. You need not order me to.
